title: Jungle Nidalee's first clear
body: I used to do it with traps, but they got nerfed. How do I consistently clear my first 2 camps without using all of my pots?{{champion:76}}  Runes/Mastery advice needed too.

replies.body:
I think a somewhat standard build on her is 21/9/0 with AD reds, Armor yellows, and AP blues/Quints.

As far as what to actually do in the jungle, start Q and make sure to get a Hunted takedown for each Hunt you apply. Additionally, on camps that can be kited, like Blue/Red/Wolves, use the root from Hunt to save yourself taking some damage on those camps. Lastly, assuming you learn E at level 2, if you get too low early on for some reason (like if you got no leash at all or something like that), she's especially good at taking crab, and you can throw a heal on yourself while doing it before moving on to a camp that damages you.

I still start W P:
you can place prep traps at the buff camp and some at the camp you start on. cougar W is actually really good for clearing with this too.

Clears healthier and a little quicker than starting Q in my experience. I got the technique from watching I believe Santorin. It worked amazingly.

W>E>Q then max Q of course still

Q+W makes her really good at kiting blue buff. 

Make a trap a few steps away from the blue buff:

Q,auto auto, it steps on the trap, auto auto, cougar W+Q, trap, repeat.
